action.content:
I need your help, I am stuck in a mapworld environment. 
Your task is to help me reach an escape room. I do not know what the escape room looks like. 
But fortunately, you have an image of the escape room with you. I will explore each room here and ask you a few QUESTIONS
to verify if we have the same image or not, thus verifying if I am in the Escape Room or not.

First start by describing the image that you have, Respond in the following format
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image that you have

Then if I ask a QUESTION, the respond appropriately based on your image in the following format
ANSWER: your Answer
action.label: context

action.content: DESCRIPTION: The image shows a luxurious bathroom. There's a large, arched window draped with sheer white curtains, letting in bright light. Below the window is a marble bathtub with silver fixtures. To the right of the window is a wall with a wall-mounted lamp and a towel rack with a neatly folded white towel. A potted plant with orchids sits on a dark vanity with a marble countertop. The room is predominantly white and marble, giving it a clean and elegant look. There is a glass
action.label: response

action.content:
You are stuck in a mapworld environment containing several rooms. 
Your task is to explore this world and reach an escape room.
You are always given an image of the current room you are in. 
I have an image of the Escape Room, this is an initial description of my image - DESCRIPTION: The image shows a luxurious bathroom. There's a large, arched window draped with sheer white curtains, letting in bright light. Below the window is a marble bathtub with silver fixtures. To the right of the window is a wall with a wall-mounted lamp and a towel rack with a neatly folded white towel. A potted plant with orchids sits on a dark vanity with a marble countertop. The room is predominantly white and marble, giving it a clean and elegant look. There is a glass.

Based on my description and the image given, you now have three options

First Option - If you think that the description of my image matches the image you have, i.e.
you are in the escape room then respond with one word - ESCAPE.

Second Option - If you think you need more details from my image - respond in the following format
QUESTION: Ask details about the image I have to verify if we have the same image or not

Third Option - If you think you are in a different room than what I have, i.e we are seeing different images,
then you can make a move in following Directions - ['north', 'east']. Respond in the following format
MOVE: direction - Here direction can be one of {north, south, east, west}
action.label: context

action.content: QUESTION: Is there a bathtub or any bathroom fixtures visible in the image? Also, is the predominant color scheme white and marble?
action.label: response

action.content: question: is there a bathtub or any bathroom fixtures visible in the image? also, is the predominant color scheme white and marble?
action.label: context

action.content: ANSWER: Yes, there is a bathtub visible in the image, along with other bathroom fixtures like a sink and silver taps. And yes, the predominant color scheme is indeed white and marble.
action.label: response

action.content: ANSWER: Yes, there is a bathtub visible in the image, along with other bathroom fixtures like a sink and silver taps. And yes, the predominant color scheme is indeed white and marble
action.label: context

action.content: QUESTION: Is there a large, arched window draped with sheer white curtains in the image? Also, is there a potted plant with orchids on a dark vanity with a marble countertop?

action.content: question: is there a large, arched window draped with sheer white curtains in the image? also, is there a potted plant with orchids on a dark vanity with a marble countertop?
action.label: context

action.content: ANSWER: Yes, there is a large, arched window draped with sheer white curtains. And yes, there is a potted plant with orchids on a dark vanity with a marble countertop, as you described.
action.label: response
